INCORRECT_PASSWORD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Invalid credentials. Please try again.

INACTIVE_USER_TOKEN_PRESENT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There is already an account with this email. Resend verification email?

USER_NOT_EXIST.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! We could not find this email address. Please check your credentials and try again.

USER_EXISTS.ERROR_MESSAGE: There is already an account with this email. Proceed to login.

ACTIVATION_ACCOUNT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Old account activation link has been sent.

ACCOUNT_DELETED.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Your account is already deleted.

ALREADY_ACTIVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Your account is already verified. Please proceed to login.

ACTIVE_NEW_ACCOUNT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Thanks! Your account is verified successfully. You can now login to your account.

INVALID_URL.ERROR_MESSAGE: Something has gone wrong with URL.

INVALID_SESSION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Looks like your session has expired. Please login again.

SESSION_NOT_EXIST.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Looks like your session has expired. Please login again.

ERROR_DELETEING_USER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to delete user account. Please try again after sometime.

GROUP_UPDATION_ERROR.ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to update / delete group information.

ERROR_DELETEING_GROUP.ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to delete group. Please try again after sometime.

NEW_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PENDING.ERROR_MESSAGE: New Email Id verification process is pending.

ALREADY_EMAIL.ERROR_MESSAGE: Email Already Sent.Please check your Email Id.

WRONG_PASSWORD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Incorrect password. Please enter your correct password and retry.

ADMIN_LEAVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: You are the only admin of group. Please assign admin permissions to other member before you leave group.

EMPTY_DOCUMENT_ARRAY.ERROR_MESSAGE: Please select atleast one media/document to delete.

SINGLE_ADMIN_LEAVE_PROJECT.ERROR_MESSAGE: You are the only admin of project. Please assign Admin permissions to other Member before you leave project.

UNIQUE_PROJECT_IN_GROUP.ERROR_MESSAGE: Project with the given name already exist in same group. Please, select different Project name.

UNIQUE_GROUP_IN_SYSTEM.ERROR_MESSAGE: Group with the given name already exist in the system. Please, select different Group name.

PROJECT_NOT_EXIST.ERROR_MESSAGE: The project you are trying to verify does not exist.

UNIQUE_ENTRY_IN_PROJECT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Entry with the given name already exist in same project. Please, select different Entry name.

DOCUMENT_NOT_EXIST.ERROR_MESSAGE: This document not exists in project.

DOCUMENT_EXIST.ERROR_MESSAGE: This document already exists in project.

INACTIVE_USER_TOKEN_NOT_PRESENT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There is already a user signed up with this email and verification link has expired.

INACTIVE_USER_LINK_UNEXPIRED.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Your account is not verified. Please verify account before logging in.

INACTIVE_USER_LINK_EXPIRED.ERROR_MESSAGE: User is not verified and verification link has expired.

UNIQUE_ACTION_IN_PROJECT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Action with the given name already exist in same project. Please, select different Action name.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_LINK_EXPIRED.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Looks like your forgot password verification link has expired.

NEW_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_LINK_EXPIRED.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Looks like your new email verification link has expired.

NEW_EMAIL_USED_BY_SOMEONE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Looks like there is another account with the same email address. Please check your address and retry.

NOT_GROUP_MEMBER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! You can't delete this group.

NOT_PERMISSION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! You need permission to perform this action.

RESPONDED_NOTIFICATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: You already responded to this notification.

CONTENT_NOT_AVAILABLE.ERROR_MESSAGE: This content is no longer available.

NOT_MEMBER_OF_PROJECT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! You can't access this project.
